r.s:
CSSセレクタをXPathに変換します このライブラリは[http://search.cpan.org/dist/HTML-Selector-XPath/lib/HTML/Selector/XPath.pm:title=HTML::Selector::XPath]のPHP移殖版となります。
This library converts css selector to XPath. This is the PHP port of [http://search.cpan.org/dist/HTML-Selector-XPath/lib/HTML/Selector/XPath.pm:title=HTML::Selector::XPath]
